contents: Article 5 (Composition) ① The committee shall be composed of the following members. 1. 1 chairperson 2. Up to 3 vice chairpersons *3. 11 to 15 members (including chairperson and vice-chairman) ​Amended on April 3, 2017, January 31, 2019 ② When forming committee members, the following shall apply. 1. In accordance with Article 45, Paragraph 3 of the Articles of Incorporation, any person who is disqualified from being an officer of the Sports Association cannot become a member. Revised on April 28, 2016, January 31, 2019, and December 27, 2021. Graduates and current employees of the same university cannot exceed 20% of the registered members. 3. At least 50% of the registered members must be former gamers (players, coaches, referees, player managers). Revised on December 27, 2021. 4. A person serving as a leader cannot become a committee member. Newly established on April 28, 2016. 5. Efforts should be made to ensure that the ratio of specific genders does not exceed 70% of the registered members. ③ The committee shall have one secretary, who is appointed by the President of the Korea Sports Council (hereinafter referred to as *Chairman) from among the staff of the Sports Council. Revised on January 31, 2019, December 27, 2021. ④ The Committee may establish a sub-steering committee under its umbrella in order to improve the efficient operation and expertise of the Committee. ⑤ The member sport organization referee committee may form a subcommittee of three or more people (including judges) with authority and responsibility for the operation of the competition prior to the competition in order to deal with the exclusion, avoidance, and evasion of referees during the competition. , the decision of the subcommittee is considered the decision of the referee committee. Revised 2023. 2. 10.
